name: 2018/10/16 Adlai Carrot Rice
description: This wholesome Adlai Carrot Rice is perfect for health-conscious individuals looking for a low-sodium and low-sugar meal. A healthy twist on your regular rice dish that doesn't skimp on flavor. Ideal for those seeking delicious and nutritious diet-friendly recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice under cold running water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Adlai Rice in a pot of boiling water with a pinch of salt. Follow the package instructions for the cooking time, then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and dice the carrots into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, sauté the minced garlic until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced carrots to the pan and cook until they are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked Adlai Rice with the sautéed carrots and garlic. Stir well and season with salt to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
